bibl.title: The ploion hellenikon of Roman Egypt: What was Greek about it?
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: Riverine transport in Egypt. - Nile vessels in Greek and Roman Egypt. - River vessels with distinctive features. - The ploion hellenikon (Greek boat).
